recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
preparation: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
In a large skillet, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, grated cheese, and black pepper.
Drain the cooked spaghetti and immediately add it to the skillet with the bacon grease. Toss to coat.
Remove the skillet from heat and quickly pour in the egg mixture, stirring constantly. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs.
Crumble the reserved bacon over the pasta and toss to combine. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Delicious homemade chocolate chip cookies that are perfect for any occasion.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and mix well.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until golden brown.
Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy chicken salad recipe perfect for lunch or dinner.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, mayonnaise, mustard, celery, red onion, and dill.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Gently fold the ingredients together until well combined.
Serve the chicken salad on a bed of lettuce or in a sandwich.
Enjoy!

recipes.title: Omelette
recipes.description: A classic breakfast dish made with eggs and various fillings.
preparation: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk until well beaten.
Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
Pour the beaten eggs into the pan and cook for a few minutes until the edges start to set.
Sprinkle your chosen fillings (such as cheese, vegetables, or ham) onto one half of the omelette.
Fold the other half of the omelette over the fillings and cook for another minute or until the filling is heated through.
Slide the omelette onto a plate and serve hot.
ingredients: Fillings of your choice (e.g. cheese, vegetables, ham)

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and fluffy pancakes
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the pan for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for another minute or until golden brown.
Serve hot with maple syrup or your favorite toppings.
ingredients: Maple syrup or toppings of your choice

recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and fluffy pancakes that are perfect for breakfast.
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, melted butter, and eggs.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Scoop 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes until golden brown.
Serve warm with maple syrup and your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy stir-fry recipe with chicken and vegetables.
preparation: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add the onions, bell peppers, and carrots.
Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic and ginger and cook for another minute.
Return the chicken to the skillet and add the soy sauce and honey.
Stir well to combine and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A healthy and delicious salad packed with roasted vegetables and quinoa.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
Chop your favorite vegetables into bite-sized pieces. Suggestions include bell peppers, zucchini, eggplant, and cherry tomatoes.
Place the chopped vegetables on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Season with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.
Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
While the vegetables are roasting, cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
In a large bowl, combine the roasted vegetables and cooked quinoa.
Drizzle with a simple vinaigrette made from olive oil, lemon juice, and Dijon mustard.
Toss the salad gently to coat everything in the dressing.
Serve the roasted vegetable quinoa salad as a main dish or side dish. Enjoy!
ingredients: Assorted vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, eggplant, cherry tomatoes)

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy grilled salmon recipe with a tangy lemon butter sauce.
preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
In a small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.
Add lemon juice and zest to the melted butter and stir well.
Remove salmon from grill and drizzle with lemon butter sauce.
Serve hot with your favorite side dishes.
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: grilled salmon with lemon butter sauce

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Delicious and chewy chocolate chip cookies that everyone will love!
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water. Add to batter along with salt.
Stir in flour, chocolate chips, and nuts (optional).
Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans.
Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.

recipes.title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
recipes.description: A delicious and indulgent snack that is perfect for parties or a cozy night in.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a small bowl, mix together softened butter, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and a pinch of salt.
Slice a baguette into thick slices, without cutting all the way through.
Spread the garlic butter mixture between the bread slices.
Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese over the bread, making sure to get it into the cuts.
Wrap the baguette in aluminum foil and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake for an additional 5 minutes, or until the cheese is golden and bubbly.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Delicious and healthy stuffed bell peppers filled with quinoa and vegetables.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds and membranes.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onions, minced garlic, and diced carrots to the skillet. Saut챕 until the vegetables are tender.
Add cooked quinoa, diced tomatoes, corn kernels, black beans, and your choice of spices to the skillet. Stir well to combine.
Stuff the bell peppers with the quinoa mixture and place them in a baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the bell peppers are tender.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: Spices of your choice (such as cumin, paprika, chili powder)

recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and fluffy pancakes that are perfect for breakfast.
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Scoop 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for another minute or until golden brown.
Serve hot with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Baked Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: A delicious and healthier version of the classic Italian dish.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
In a shallow dish, mix together breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, dried oregano, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Dip each chicken breast in beaten egg, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
Place the coated chicken breasts on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and golden brown.
Meanwhile, heat marinara sauce in a saucepan over medium heat until warmed through.
Remove the chicken from the oven and top each breast with a spoonful of marinara sauce and a slice of mozzarella cheese.
Return the chicken to the oven and bake for an additional 5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve the baked chicken Parmesan with pasta or a side salad.

recipes.title: Vegan Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A hearty and nutritious soup made with lentils and vegetables.
preparation: Rinse the lentils and set aside.
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chopped onions, carrots, and celery to the pot and cook until softened.
Stir in minced garlic and spices (such as cumin, paprika, and turmeric) and cook for another minute.
Add the rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, and diced tomatoes to the pot.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Delicious homemade chocolate chip cookies that are perfect for any occasion.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until smooth and creamy.
Beat in the eggs and vanilla extract until well combined.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden brown around the edges.
Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer them to wire racks to cool completely.

recipes.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy side dish
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
Trim the ends of the Brussels sprouts and cut them in half.
In a large bowl, toss the Brussels sprouts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread the Brussels sprouts in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the Brussels sprouts are tender and caramelized.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Delicious Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: Indulge in the rich and moist chocolate cake that will satisfy your sweet cravings.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 180째C (350째F).
Grease and flour a round cake pan.

In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 3/4 cups of sugar, 3/4 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons of baking powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons of baking soda, and 1 teaspoon of salt.
Add 2 eggs, 1 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of vegetable oil, and 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract to the dry ingredients. Mix until well combined.
Pour 1 cup of boiling water into the batter and mix until smooth.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
Once the cake is completely cooled, frost it with your favorite chocolate frosting.
Serve and enjoy!

recipes.title: Roasted Chicken with Garlic Butter
recipes.description: A delicious and flavorful roasted chicken recipe that is perfect for dinner.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
In a small bowl, mix together softened butter, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and rub the garlic butter mixture all over the chicken, including under the skin.
Season the chicken with additional salt, pepper, and your choice of herbs or spices.
Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until the internal temperature reaches 165째F (74째C).
Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes before carving.
Serve the roasted chicken with your favorite side dishes.
ingredients: Herbs or spices of your choice

recipes.title: Blueberry Oatmeal Muffins
recipes.description: Delicious and healthy muffins packed with blueberries and oats.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C) and line a muffin tin with paper liners.
In a large bowl, combine 1 쩍 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 cup of rolled oats, 1/2 cup of sugar, 1 tablespoon of baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together 1 cup of milk, 1/4 cup of melted butter, 1/4 cup of plain yogurt, 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract, and 2 eggs.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Gently fold in 1 쩍 cups of fresh or frozen blueberries.
Divide the batter evenly among the muffin cups.
Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow the muffins to cool for 5 minutes in the tin, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
ingredients: 1 쩍 cups fresh or frozen blueberries

recipes.title: Baked Teriyaki Chicken
recipes.description: Delicious and flavorful chicken marinated in homemade teriyaki sauce and baked to perfection.
preparation: In a bowl, combine soy sauce, brown sugar, honey, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil.
Add chicken to the marinade and let it marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Place the marinated chicken in a baking dish and pour the marinade over it.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
Serve hot with steamed rice and vegetables.
ingredients: Steamed rice and vegetables, for serving

recipes.title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
recipes.description: A delicious and savory bread topped with melted cheese and garlic
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
Slice a baguette into thick slices.
In a small bowl, mix together softened butter, minced garlic, and chopped parsley.
Spread the garlic butter mixture onto each slice of bread.
Place the bread slices on a baking sheet and sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes or until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
Serve warm and enjoy!

recipes.title: Mango Salsa
recipes.description: A refreshing and tangy salsa made with ripe mangoes, onions, jalapenos, and cilantro.
preparation: Peel and dice the mangoes.
Finely chop the onions, jalapenos, and cilantro.
In a bowl, combine the mangoes, onions, jalapenos, and cilantro.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Mix well and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
recipes.description: A delicious and moist banana bread loaded with chocolate chips.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a large bowl, mash the bananas with a fork until smooth.
Add the melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract to the bowl with the mashed bananas. Mix well.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the banana mixture, stirring until just combined.
Fold in the chocolate chips.
Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy and delicious pasta dish made with chicken and Alfredo sauce.
preparation: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in milk and bring to a simmer.
Add grated Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and smooth.
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning.
Return cooked chicken to the skillet and stir to coat with the sauce.
Add cooked pasta and toss until well coated.
Serve hot and garnish with chopped parsley.

recipes.title: Spicy Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful and hearty curry made with chickpeas and spices.
preparation: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onions, garlic, and ginger and saut챕 until onions are translucent.
Add spices (cumin, coriander, turmeric, garam masala, chili powder) and cook for 1 minute.
Add diced tomatoes and tomato paste and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add chickpeas, coconut milk, and vegetable broth. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy salad made with grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, and creamy Caesar dressing.
preparation: Grill the chicken breasts until cooked through.
Chop the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Prepare the Caesar dressing by combining mayonnaise, garlic, anchovy paste, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and Parmesan cheese.
Slice the grilled chicken into thin strips.
In a large bowl, toss the romaine lettuce with the Caesar dressing.
Add the sliced chicken and toss to combine.
Serve the salad with additional Parmesan cheese and croutons, if desired.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious and flavorful beef tacos that are perfect for a quick and easy dinner.
preparation: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, stirring until well combined.
Simmer for 5 minutes, then remove from heat.
Warm the tortillas in a separate skillet or in the microwave.
Fill each tortilla with the beef mixture and your favorite toppings.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: Toppings of your choice: shredded cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, salsa, sour cream

recipes.title: Crispy Baked Chicken Wings
recipes.description: Delicious and crispy baked chicken wings perfect for snacking or as an appetizer.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, mix together 1/4 cup of olive oil, 2 teaspoons of paprika, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper.
Add 2 pounds of chicken wings to the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the seasoning mixture.
Arrange the chicken wings on the prepared baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake in the preheated oven for 40-45 minutes, or until the wings are crispy and golden brown.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A simple and delicious breakfast option
preparation: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Spread mashed avocado evenly on each slice of toast.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Optional: top with sliced tomatoes, feta cheese, or a poached egg.
Serve immediately.
ingredients: Optional toppings: sliced tomatoes, feta cheese, poached egg

recipes.title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy stir-fry recipe with beef and broccoli
preparation: Slice the beef into thin strips.
In a bowl, mix together soy sauce, oyster sauce, garlic, ginger, and cornstarch.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add beef and stir-fry until browned.
Remove beef from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add broccoli florets and cook until tender-crisp.
Return the beef to the pan and pour the sauce mixture over it.
Stir well and cook for a few more minutes until the sauce thickens.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad with Grilled Chicken
recipes.description: A healthy and flavorful salad with grilled chicken and quinoa, inspired by Mediterranean cuisine.
preparation: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions and set aside to cool.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and dried oregano. Grill for 6-8 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes. Slice it into strips.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Divide the salad into serving plates and top with the grilled chicken strips.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1/4 cup Kalamata olives, pitted and sliced
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: mediterranean quinoa salad with grilled chicken

recipes.title: Apple Cinnamon Overnight Oats
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy breakfast option that can be prepared the night before.
preparation: In a jar, combine rolled oats, almond milk, chia seeds, cinnamon, and maple syrup.
Stir well to combine all the ingredients.
Cover the jar and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, give the oats a good stir and top with sliced apples, nuts, and a drizzle of honey.
Enjoy!

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make fried rice recipe with eggs.
preparation: Cook the rice according to package instructions and set aside.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chopped vegetables (such as carrots, peas, and bell peppers) and cook until slightly tender.
Push the vegetables to one side of the pan and crack the eggs into the other side.
Scramble the eggs and then mix them with the vegetables.
Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir-fry everything together.
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper to taste.
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve hot.
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, bell peppers)

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and healthy stir-fry packed with fresh vegetables.
preparation: Prepare all the vegetables by washing and chopping them into bite-sized pieces.
Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add the garlic and ginger to the skillet and cook for a minute until fragrant.
Add the vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry for about 5-7 minutes until they are crisp-tender.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir to coat evenly.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
Serve the vegetable stir-fry hot with steamed rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Banana Bread
recipes.description: A delicious and moist banana bread recipe
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a mixing bowl, mash the ripe bananas with a fork.
Add the melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract to the bowl and mix well.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the banana mixture and stir until just combined.
Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow the banana bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: Delicious and flavorful chicken fajitas made with tender chicken, colorful bell peppers, and onions.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, lime juice, olive oil, garlic, chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Let marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add the sliced bell peppers and onions. Cook until the vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
Return the chicken to the skillet and toss with the vegetables. Cook for an additional 2 minutes to heat through.
Serve the chicken fajitas with warm tortillas, salsa, guacamole, and sour cream. Enjoy!
ingredients: Salsa, guacamole, and sour cream for serving

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A light and refreshing salad with grilled chicken and Mediterranean flavors.
preparation: Marinate the chicken breasts in a mixture of olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper for 30 minutes.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Grill the chicken breasts for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Let the chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice it into thin strips.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese.
Add the sliced grilled chicken to the bowl.
In a small jar, combine olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper. Shake well to emulsify.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A healthy and delicious grilled chicken salad
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Let the chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice it into thin strips.
In a large bowl, combine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and avocado.
Add the sliced grilled chicken to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Salmon
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy dinner option
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a small bowl, combine melted butter, minced garlic, lemon juice, and lemon zest. Season with salt and pepper.
Place the salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush the lemon garlic mixture over the salmon fillets, ensuring they are evenly coated.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve hot with steamed vegetables or a side salad.

recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs
recipes.description: A simple and delicious breakfast option
preparation: Crack the eggs into a bowl
Whisk the eggs until well beaten
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat
Melt butter in the pan
Pour the beaten eggs into the pan
Stir the eggs continuously with a spatula
Cook until the eggs are set but still creamy
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve hot

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy low-carb lunch option.
preparation: Slice the chicken breasts into thin strips.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, lime juice, honey, and red pepper flakes.
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken strips and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add the sliced bell peppers, onion, and garlic.
Cook for 3-4 minutes, until the vegetables are slightly softened.
Return the chicken to the skillet and pour the sauce over it.
Stir well to coat everything in the sauce and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve the spicy chicken stir-fry over a bed of cauliflower rice or steamed rice.

recipes.title: Roasted Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy vegetarian option for dinner or lunch.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
Peel and dice the sweet potatoes into small cubes.
In a mixing bowl, toss the sweet potatoes with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Spread the seasoned sweet potatoes on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and slightly crispy.
While the sweet potatoes are roasting, heat a skillet over medium heat and add the black beans. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Warm the tortillas in a separate skillet or in the oven.
To assemble the tacos, fill each tortilla with roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, diced tomatoes, sliced avocado, and a drizzle of lime juice.
Serve the tacos with your favorite salsa or hot sauce.
Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
Salsa or hot sauce for serving
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: roasted sweet potato and black bean tacos

recipes.title: Spicy Black Bean Quesadillas
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make vegetarian dish.
preparation: Heat a large skillet over medium heat.
Add olive oil and diced onion. Cook until onion is translucent.
Add minced garlic and cook for another minute.
Add black beans, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and mash the black bean mixture slightly.
Spread a layer of black bean mixture on one tortilla.
Sprinkle shredded cheese over the black bean mixture.
Place another tortilla on top and press gently.
Repeat with the remaining tortillas and black bean mixture.
Heat a clean skillet over medium heat.
Cook each quesadilla for 2-3 minutes on each side, until cheese is melted and tortillas are crispy.
Cut quesadillas into wedges and serve hot.
ingredients: 2 cans black beans, drained and rinsed
2 cups shredded cheese (Cheddar or Mexican blend)

recipes.title: Spicy Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A flavorful and nutritious salad made with quinoa, vegetables, and a spicy dressing.
preparation: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, diced bell peppers, chopped cucumber, sliced cherry tomatoes, and minced red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lime juice, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the quinoa mixture and toss to combine.
Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy smoothie made with chocolate and banana.
preparation: Peel and slice a ripe banana.
Add the banana slices to a blender.
Add 1 cup of milk (or almond milk for a vegan option) to the blender.
Add 1 tablespoon of cocoa powder.
Add 1 tablespoon of honey or maple syrup for sweetness.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Tomato and Mozzarella Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and light salad with juicy tomatoes and creamy mozzarella.
preparation: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds.
Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves.
Serve and enjoy!

recipes.title: Mediterranean Grilled Chicken
recipes.description: A healthy and flavorful chicken dish with Mediterranean flavors.
preparation: In a small bowl, combine minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Place chicken breasts in a shallow dish and pour the marinade over them. Make sure the chicken is well coated. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight in the refrigerator.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Remove chicken from the marinade and discard the excess marinade. Place the chicken on the grill and cook for about 6-8 minutes per side, or until the internal temperature reaches 165째F (75째C).
Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
Serve the Mediterranean grilled chicken with a side of roasted vegetables or a fresh salad.

recipes.title: Keto Avocado Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad made with fresh avocados and mixed greens.
preparation: Wash and dry the mixed greens.
Peel and pit the avocados, then slice them into thin wedges.
In a large bowl, combine the mixed greens and avocado slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice for dressing.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss gently to coat all the ingredients.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Grilled Vegetable Skewers
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy option for a vegetarian BBQ
preparation: Prepare the vegetables by cutting them into bite-sized pieces.
In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Thread the vegetables onto skewers, alternating between different types of vegetables.
Brush the vegetable skewers with the olive oil mixture.
Grill the skewers over medium heat for about 10-15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly charred.
Serve the grilled vegetable skewers as a side dish or as a main course.
Enjoy!

recipes.title: Beef and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy stir-fry recipe with beef and mushrooms.
preparation: Slice the beef into thin strips.
Heat a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add some oil and stir-fry the beef until browned.
Remove the beef from the wok and set aside.
In the same wok, add more oil and stir-fry the mushrooms until tender.
Add the beef back to the wok and stir-fry for another minute.
Season with soy sauce, oyster sauce, and black pepper.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: A comforting and delicious soup filled with chicken, vegetables, and noodles.
preparation: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onions, carrots, and celery. Cook until vegetables are softened.
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add chicken breasts and simmer until cooked through.
Remove chicken breasts from the pot and shred with a fork.
Return shredded chicken to the pot.
Add egg noodles and cook until tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: Herbs or spices of your choice

recipes.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Smoothie
recipes.description: A creamy and indulgent smoothie made with chocolate and peanut butter.
preparation: Add the frozen banana, chocolate protein powder, peanut butter, almond milk, and ice cubes to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Keto Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy breakfast option for those following a keto diet.
preparation: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread slices.
Optional: Top with sliced tomatoes, crumbled feta cheese, or a drizzle of olive oil.
Serve immediately and enjoy!
ingredients: Optional toppings: sliced tomatoes, crumbled feta cheese, olive oil

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy and flavorful dish made with Arborio rice and mushrooms.
preparation: Heat the vegetable broth in a saucepan and keep it warm.
In a separate large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the saucepan and saut챕 until translucent.
Add the Arborio rice to the saucepan and stir to coat it with the butter.
Pour in the white wine and cook until it is absorbed by the rice.
Begin adding the warm vegetable broth to the saucepan, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly and allowing the broth to be absorbed before adding more.
Continue this process until the rice is cooked al dente, about 20-25 minutes.
In a separate skillet, heat olive oil and saut챕 sliced mushrooms until they are tender and browned.
Once the rice is cooked, stir in the saut챕ed mushrooms, grated Parmesan cheese, and chopped parsley.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad packed with Mediterranean flavors.
preparation: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine the cooled quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the quinoa mixture and toss to combine.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve chilled.
ingredients: 1/4 cup Kalamata olives, pitted and halved

recipes.title: Maple Glazed Salmon
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy salmon dish with a sweet maple glaze.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
In a small bowl, mix together maple syrup, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Place the salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush the maple glaze over the salmon fillets.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through.
Serve hot with steamed vegetables or rice.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy chicken salad recipe that is perfect for a keto diet.
preparation: Cook the chicken breasts in a pan until they are fully cooked.
Let the chicken cool and then shred it into small pieces.
In a large bowl, combine the shredded chicken, mayonnaise, diced celery, diced red onion, and chopped parsley.
Season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste.
Mix everything together until well combined.
Refrigerate the chicken salad for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve the chicken salad on a bed of lettuce or in a low-carb wrap for a delicious and satisfying meal.
ingredients: Salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste
Lettuce or low-carb wraps for serving

recipes.title: Cheeseburger
recipes.description: A classic American cheeseburger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, and all the fixings.
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Form ground beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the patties for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked to desired doneness.
During the last minute of cooking, place a slice of cheese on each patty to melt.
Toast the burger buns on the grill for a few seconds until lightly toasted.
Assemble the burgers by placing the patties on the bottom buns.
Top with lettuce, tomato, onion, and any other desired toppings.
Spread mayonnaise and ketchup on the top buns.
Place the top buns on the assembled burgers.
Serve immediately and enjoy!
ingredients: 4 slices of cheese (American, cheddar, or your choice)

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: A delicious and hearty vegetarian dinner option.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).
Slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch thick rounds.
In a shallow dish, combine breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Dip each eggplant round into beaten eggs, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Fry the breaded eggplant rounds until golden brown on both sides.
Transfer the fried eggplant to a baking dish.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the eggplant rounds.
Top with shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: A delicious and nutritious smoothie made with peanut butter and bananas.
preparation: In a blender, combine 1 ripe banana, 2 tablespoons of peanut butter, 1 cup of milk, and 1 tablespoon of honey.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!

recipes.title: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy stir-fry recipe with chicken and a variety of vegetables.
preparation: In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, honey, ginger, and garlic.
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Return chicken to skillet and pour in the soy sauce mixture.
Stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes, until everything is heated through.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, and snap peas)

recipes.title: Chicken and Rice Casserole
recipes.description: A delicious and comforting casserole dish made with chicken, rice, and vegetables.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced chicken and cook until browned.
Add chopped onions, minced garlic, and sliced mushrooms to the skillet. Cook until onions are translucent and mushrooms are tender.
Stir in cooked rice, frozen mixed vegetables, and condensed cream of chicken soup. Season with salt, pepper, and dried thyme.
Transfer the mixture to a greased casserole dish. Top with shredded cheddar cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 can condensed cream of chicken soup

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a rich tomato and meat sauce.
preparation: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and chopped onion to the pan and cook until softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, and seasonings.
Simmer the sauce for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve the spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce.
Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves.

recipes.title: Blueberry Cheesecake
recipes.description: Delicious and creamy cheesecake with a sweet blueberry topping.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a mixing bowl, combine crushed graham crackers, melted butter, and sugar. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan.
In a separate mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Pour the cream cheese mixture over the crust in the springform pan. Smooth the top with a spatula.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly golden.
Remove from the oven and let it cool completely. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
In a saucepan, combine blueberries, sugar, and lemon juice. Cook over medium heat until the blueberries burst and the mixture thickens. Remove from heat and let it cool.
Pour the blueberry topping over the chilled cheesecake.
Slice and serve chilled. Enjoy!
ingredients: 3 packages (8 oz each) cream cheese, softened

recipes.title: Spicy Shrimp Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy keto-friendly dinner option
preparation: Heat a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat
Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil and heat until shimmering
Add 1 pound of shrimp and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until pink and cooked through
Remove the shrimp from the pan and set aside
In the same pan, add 1 sliced red bell pepper, 1 sliced yellow bell pepper, and 1 sliced onion
Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp
Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and 1 tablespoon of grated ginger
Cook for another 1 minute until fragrant
In a small bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of sriracha sauce, and 1 tablespoon of honey (optional)
Pour the sauce over the vegetables and stir to coat
Return the cooked shrimp to the pan and toss to combine
Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until heated through
Serve the spicy shrimp stir-fry over cauliflower rice or zucchini noodles
Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds, if desired
ingredients: 1 pound of shrimp, peeled and deveined
Cauliflower rice or zucchini noodles, for serving
Chopped green onions and sesame seeds, for garnish

recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs with Bacon
recipes.description: A classic breakfast dish made with fluffy scrambled eggs and crispy bacon.
preparation: In a skillet, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove from skillet and drain on paper towels.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and pepper.
Heat the skillet over medium heat and pour in the egg mixture.
Cook the eggs, stirring occasionally, until they are just set.
Crumble the cooked bacon and sprinkle it over the scrambled eggs.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A delicious and colorful pasta dish loaded with fresh vegetables.
preparation: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add vegetables (such as bell peppers, zucchini, carrots, and broccoli) and saut챕 until tender-crisp.
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning.
Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine.
Serve hot and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Keto Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy breakfast option for those following a keto diet.
preparation: Slice the avocado and mash it with a fork in a small bowl.
Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Spread the mashed avocado onto the toasted bread slices.
Drizzle olive oil on top of the avocado spread.
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with a sprinkle of chili flakes and a squeeze of lemon juice.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Chicken and Broccoli Casserole
recipes.description: A delicious and comforting casserole dish made with chicken, broccoli, and creamy sauce.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add diced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from heat and set aside.
In the same skillet, melt butter. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add flour to the skillet and whisk until well combined. Gradually whisk in chicken broth and milk.
Cook the sauce over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened and bubbly.
Stir in shredded cheese until melted and smooth. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add cooked chicken and steamed broccoli to the sauce. Stir until well coated.
Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish.
In a small bowl, mix together breadcrumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle the breadcrumb mixture over the casserole.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the top is golden and the casserole is heated through.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Cheesy Bacon Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.description: Delicious and savory stuffed mushrooms filled with a cheesy bacon mixture.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Clean the mushrooms and remove the stems.
In a skillet, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove from the skillet and drain on paper towels. Once cooled, crumble the bacon into small pieces.
In the same skillet, melt the butter and saut챕 the garlic until fragrant.
In a mixing bowl, combine the crumbled bacon, saut챕ed garlic, cream cheese, grated Parmesan, chopped parsley, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
Stuff each mushroom cap with the cheese and bacon mixture.
Place the stuffed mushrooms on a baking sheet and bake for about 20 minutes or until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Cheesy Zucchini Bites
recipes.description: Delicious low-carb snack made with zucchini and cheese
preparation: Preheat the oven to 180째C (350째F).
Grate 2 medium-sized zucchinis and squeeze out any excess moisture.
In a bowl, mix the grated zucchini with 1 cup of shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/4 cup of grated Parmesan cheese, and 2 beaten eggs.
Add 1/2 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon of dried oregano, and salt and pepper to taste. Mix well.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and spoon the zucchini mixture onto it, forming small bite-sized rounds.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until golden and crispy.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad packed with Mediterranean flavors.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, diced tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Let the salad marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve chilled and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 cans of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and fluffy pancakes loaded with chocolate chips.
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Do not overmix.
Gently fold in the chocolate chips.
Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Grease with butter or cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes.
Serve hot with maple syrup and additional chocolate chips for garnish.
ingredients: Butter or cooking spray for greasing the skillet

recipes.title: Oatmeal Breakfast Bowl
recipes.description: A delicious and nutritious breakfast bowl made with oats and fresh fruits.
preparation: In a saucepan, bring 1 cup of water to a boil.
Add 1/2 cup of rolled oats and reduce heat to low.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and let it sit for a minute.
Transfer the cooked oats to a bowl.
Top with sliced bananas, blueberries, and a drizzle of honey.
Sprinkle with a handful of chopped almonds.
Enjoy your healthy and filling breakfast bowl!

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad with grilled chicken and Mediterranean flavors.
preparation: Prepare the marinade by mixing olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Place chicken breasts in a ziplock bag and pour the marinade over them. Seal the bag and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Grill the marinated chicken breasts for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes. Slice the chicken into strips.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese.
Add the sliced grilled chicken to the salad.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Serve the Mediterranean chicken salad immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Egg Salad Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic sandwich made with creamy egg salad.
preparation: In a medium bowl, combine hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Mix well until all ingredients are evenly incorporated.
Spread the egg salad mixture onto slices of bread.
Top with lettuce and another slice of bread to make a sandwich.
Cut the sandwich into halves or quarters and serve.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: A delicious and classic Italian dish made with breaded chicken breasts topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
In a shallow bowl, combine breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, dried oregano, and garlic powder.
Dip each chicken breast into beaten eggs, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook the breaded chicken breasts until golden brown on both sides.
Transfer the chicken breasts to a baking dish and top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve the chicken Parmesan with cooked spaghetti or a side salad.
ingredients: Cooked spaghetti or side salad, for serving

recipes.title: Chicken and Rice Soup
recipes.description: A comforting and hearty soup made with chicken, rice, and vegetables.
preparation: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add diced onions, carrots, and celery. Saut챕 until vegetables are softened.
Add minced garlic and cook for an additional minute.
Add chicken broth, shredded chicken, and rice to the pot.
Season with salt, pepper, and dried herbs of your choice (such as thyme or rosemary).
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 20 minutes or until the rice is cooked.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Spicy Shrimp Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious and flavorful shrimp tacos with a spicy kick
preparation: In a small bowl, mix together chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add shrimp and sprinkle with the spice mixture. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until shrimp is pink and cooked through.
Warm tortillas in a separate skillet or microwave.
Assemble the tacos: place shrimp on each tortilla, top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, sliced avocado, and drizzle with lime juice and hot sauce.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy salad with grilled chicken, fresh vegetables, and a tangy dressing.
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before slicing it into strips.
Meanwhile, prepare the salad by combining mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and avocado in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Divide the salad onto plates and top with the sliced grilled chicken.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad with grilled chicken
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and your choice of herbs and spices.
Grill the chicken for about 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Let the chicken rest for a few minutes, then slice it into thin strips.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, and red onion.
Add the grilled chicken strips to the salad.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Serve the grilled chicken salad immediately and enjoy!
ingredients: Herbs and spices of your choice

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A flavorful and creamy Indian dish with tender chicken pieces cooked in a spiced tomato sauce.
preparation: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, ginger, garlic, turmeric, garam masala, cumin, coriander, and chili powder.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the marinated chicken until browned.
In a separate pan, saut챕 onions, ginger, and garlic until golden.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, and spices to the onion mixture and cook until the tomatoes are soft.
Blend the tomato mixture until smooth and return it to the pan.
Add the cooked chicken to the tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

recipes.title: Vegan Lentil Curry
recipes.description: A delicious and hearty vegan curry made with lentils and a blend of aromatic spices.
preparation: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onions, garlic, and ginger and saut챕 until softened.
Add curry powder, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and paprika. Stir well to coat the onions and spices.
Add diced tomatoes and tomato paste. Stir to combine.
Add vegetable broth and lentils. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes or until lentils are tender.
Stir in coconut milk and simmer for another 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve over cooked rice or with naan bread.
Garnish with fresh cilantro.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy dinner option that is perfect for a keto diet.
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
In a small saucepan, melt the butter over low heat.
Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Remove the saucepan from heat and stir in the lemon juice and zest.
Place the salmon fillets on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side, or until desired doneness.
Drizzle the lemon butter sauce over the grilled salmon fillets.
Serve hot with a side of steamed vegetables or salad.
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: grilled salmon with lemon butter sauce

recipes.title: Roasted Sweet Potato Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious and healthy roasted sweet potato tacos filled with black beans, avocado, and a tangy lime crema.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
Peel and dice the sweet potatoes into small cubes.
Toss the sweet potatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet.
Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender and slightly caramelized.
In the meantime, rinse and drain the black beans.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and add the black beans. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
In a small bowl, mix together Greek yogurt, lime juice, and chopped cilantro to make the lime crema.
Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of lime crema on each tortilla.
Top with roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, sliced avocado, and a sprinkle of chopped cilantro.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Lemon Blueberry Cheesecake
recipes.description: A delicious and tangy dessert perfect for any occasion.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a mixing bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and sugar. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch (23 cm) springform pan to form the crust.
In a separate bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and lemon zest until smooth. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in lemon juice and vanilla extract.
Pour the cream cheese mixture over the crust in the springform pan. Spread blueberries evenly over the top.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set. Remove from the oven and let it cool completely.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or overnight, before serving.
Garnish with fresh blueberries and lemon slices before serving.
ingredients: 쩌 cup (60ml) freshly squeezed lemon juice
Additional blueberries and lemon slices for garnish

recipes.title: Cheesy Baked Zucchini Fries
recipes.description: Crispy and delicious zucchini fries, perfect as a healthy snack or appetizer.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
Slice the zucchini into long sticks, about 1/2 inch thick.
In a bowl, combine breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and Italian seasoning.
Dip each zucchini stick into beaten eggs, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
Place the coated zucchini sticks on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the fries are golden brown and crispy.
Serve hot with marinara sauce or ranch dressing.
ingredients: Marinara sauce or ranch dressing, for serving

recipes.title: Delicious Pancakes
recipes.description: A fluffy and tasty breakfast option
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, melted butter, and eggs.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Preheat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the pan for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for another minute.
Serve warm with maple syrup and fresh fruits.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy and flavorful rice dish made with mushrooms
preparation: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and garlic to the pan and saut챕 until fragrant.
Add sliced mushrooms to the pan and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown.
Add Arborio rice to the pan and stir to coat it with the oil and mushrooms.
Pour in a splash of white wine and stir until it is absorbed by the rice.
Begin adding vegetable broth to the pan, one ladleful at a time, stirring constantly until each ladleful is absorbed before adding the next.
Continue adding broth and stirring until the rice is cooked al dente and has a creamy consistency.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot and garnish with fresh parsley.

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Tacos
recipes.description: Delicious and spicy chicken tacos that are perfect for a quick lunch.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Mix well to coat the chicken evenly.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
While the chicken is cooking, warm the tortillas in a separate skillet or in the microwave.
To assemble the tacos, place a spoonful of the cooked chicken onto each tortilla. Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, sliced jalapenos, and a dollop of sour cream.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Beef and Mushroom Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and flavorful stir-fry dish made with beef and mushrooms.
preparation: Slice the beef into thin strips.
In a bowl, mix together soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and cornstarch to make the marinade.
Add the beef strips to the marinade and let it sit for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add the marinated beef and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until browned.
Remove the beef from the wok and set aside.
In the same wok, add sliced mushrooms and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until tender.
Return the beef to the wok and add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar.
Stir-fry for another 2 minutes until everything is well combined and heated through.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.
ingredients: 400g beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips

recipes.title: Banana Nut Bread
recipes.description: A delicious and moist banana bread with crunchy walnuts.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a large bowl, mash the ripe bananas with a fork.
Add the melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract to the mashed bananas. Mix well.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the banana mixture, stirring until just combined.
Fold in the chopped walnuts.
Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken with Lemon Herb Sauce
recipes.description: Juicy grilled chicken served with a tangy and flavorful lemon herb sauce.
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
While the chicken is grilling, prepare the lemon herb sauce.
In a small bowl, mix together lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, chopped parsley, and dried oregano.
Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
Serve the grilled chicken with the lemon herb sauce on top.
Enjoy!
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: grilled chicken with lemon herb sauce

recipes.title: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.description: A quick and easy dish made with eggs, rice, and vegetables.
preparation: Cook the rice according to package instructions and set aside.
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
Add diced vegetables (such as carrots, peas, and bell peppers) to the skillet and cook until tender.
Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet and crack the eggs into the empty space.
Scramble the eggs until cooked through, then mix them with the vegetables.
Add the cooked rice to the skillet and stir to combine.
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper to taste.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 cup diced vegetables (carrots, peas, bell peppers)

recipes.title: Egg and Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A simple and nutritious breakfast option
preparation: Toast the bread
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast
Cook the eggs sunny-side up
Place the cooked eggs on top of the avocado toast
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Spicy Chickpea Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy salad made with spicy chickpeas and fresh vegetables
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, diced tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve the salad chilled.
Enjoy!

recipes.title: Cheesy Zucchini Bites
recipes.description: These Cheesy Zucchini Bites are a delicious low-carb snack that is perfect for any occasion. Made with fresh zucchini and a blend of flavorful cheeses, they are sure to be a hit!
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Grate the zucchini and squeeze out any excess moisture.
In a mixing bowl, combine the grated zucchini, shredded cheddar cheese, grated Parmesan cheese, minced garlic, and chopped fresh basil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Mix until well combined.
Form small balls with the zucchini mixture and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Flatten each ball with the back of a spoon to form bite-sized patties.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden and crispy.
Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.
Serve warm and enjoy!

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce and crispy bacon
preparation: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, fry the bacon until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
Once the spaghetti is cooked, drain it and return it to the pot.
Pour the egg mixture over the hot spaghetti and toss well to coat.
Add the crispy bacon to the spaghetti and mix well.
Serve immediately with additional Parmesan cheese on top.

recipes.title: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy stir-fry recipe with chicken and a variety of vegetables.
preparation: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add garlic, ginger, and vegetables.
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Return chicken to skillet and add soy sauce and sesame oil.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring constantly.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Pesto Pasta
recipes.description: A delicious and easy pasta dish with homemade pesto sauce.
preparation: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
In a blender or food processor, combine the basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil. Blend until smooth.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the pesto sauce and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat in the pesto sauce.
Serve hot and garnish with extra Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves, if desired.
ingredients: Extra Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves for garnish

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.description: A classic breakfast dish made with bread soaked in a mixture of eggs, milk, and spices, then fried until golden brown.
preparation: In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, making sure to coat both sides.
Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat and melt a pat of butter or drizzle some oil.
Place the soaked bread slices onto the skillet or griddle and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy.
Serve with maple syrup, fresh berries, or any desired toppings.

recipes.title: Omelette
recipes.description: A classic breakfast dish made with eggs and various fillings.
preparation: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk until well beaten.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add butter or oil.
Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet and let them cook for a few minutes until the edges start to set.
Add your desired fillings (such as cheese, vegetables, or ham) to one half of the omelette.
Using a spatula, carefully fold the other half of the omelette over the fillings.
Cook for another minute or two until the omelette is fully set.
Slide the omelette onto a plate and serve hot.
ingredients: Fillings of your choice (e.g. cheese, vegetables, ham)

recipes.title: Keto Avocado Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad packed with avocado goodness.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the avocado mixture and gently toss to coat.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

recipes.title: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy stir-fry dish made with chicken and a variety of fresh vegetables.
preparation: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, hoisin sauce, and cornstarch. Set aside.
Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add garlic, ginger, and vegetables. Cook for 3-4 minutes, or until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Return chicken to skillet and pour in the sauce mixture. Stir well to coat everything evenly. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until sauce has thickened.
Serve hot over steamed rice or noodles.
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
Steamed rice or noodles, for serving

recipes.title: Lemon Blueberry Cheesecake
recipes.description: A refreshing and creamy dessert that combines the tangy flavors of lemon and the sweetness of blueberries.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a medium bowl, combine crushed graham crackers, melted butter, and sugar. Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan to form the crust.
In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and lemon zest until smooth. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in lemon juice and vanilla extract.
Pour the cream cheese mixture over the crust in the springform pan. Drop blueberries evenly on top and gently swirl them into the batter using a knife.
Bake for 45-50 minutes until the center is set and the edges are lightly golden. Remove from the oven and let it cool completely.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving.
Garnish with fresh blueberries and lemon slices before serving.
ingredients: Additional blueberries and lemon slices for garnish

recipes.title: Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Delicious and chewy vegan chocolate chip cookies that are perfect for a snack or dessert!
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (180째C).
In a mixing bowl, cream together the vegan butter and brown sugar until smooth.
Add the vanilla extract and almond milk, and mix well.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until well combined.
Fold in the vegan chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of the cookie dough onto a lined baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.title: Veggie Omelette
recipes.description: A delicious and nutritious way to start your day!
preparation: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs until well combined.
Add the chopped vegetables to the eggs and mix well.
Season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices of your choice.
Pour the egg mixture into the heated pan and cook for a few minutes until the edges start to set.
Gently lift the edges of the omelette with a spatula and tilt the pan to allow the uncooked eggs to flow to the edges.
Once the omelette is mostly set but still slightly runny in the center, sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Fold one side of the omelette over the filling and cook for another minute to melt the cheese.
Carefully transfer the omelette to a plate and garnish with fresh herbs if desired.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Fluffy Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and fluffy pancakes that are perfect for breakfast
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, melted butter, and eggs.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and gently mix until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease with butter or cooking spray.
Using a 1/4 cup measure, pour the pancake batter onto the pan.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for another minute or until golden brown.
Transfer the cooked pancakes to a plate and keep warm.
Repeat with the remaining batter.
Serve the pancakes with maple syrup and your favorite toppings.
ingredients: Butter or cooking spray, for greasing the pan

recipes.title: Blueberry Lemon Muffins
recipes.description: Delicious and healthy blueberry lemon muffins that are perfect for breakfast or a snack.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the melted butter, sugar, lemon zest, lemon juice, and vanilla extract.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Gently fold in the blueberries.
Spoon the batter into a muffin tin lined with paper liners.
Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipes.title: Spicy Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy vegan dish packed with protein and flavor.
preparation: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add chopped onion, minced garlic, and grated ginger to the pan. Saut챕 until the onion is translucent.
Add curry powder, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and chili flakes to the pan. Stir well to combine the spices with the onion mixture.
Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and vegetable broth to the pan. Stir to combine.
Drain and rinse canned chickpeas. Add them to the pan along with coconut milk. Stir well.
Reduce the heat to low and let the curry simmer for 15-20 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
Meanwhile, cook basmati rice according to package instructions.
Once the curry is done, season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot over basmati rice.
Garnish with chopped cilantro and a squeeze of fresh lime juice, if desired.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing and healthy salad with grilled chicken and Mediterranean flavors.
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper to make the marinade.
Place the chicken breasts in a ziplock bag and pour the marinade over them. Seal the bag and massage the marinade into the chicken. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Grill the marinated chicken breasts for about 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let them rest for a few minutes before slicing.
In a large bowl, combine mixed salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese.
Slice the grilled chicken and add it to the salad.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve the Mediterranean grilled chicken salad immediately.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy and flavorful vegetarian risotto made with fresh mushrooms.
preparation: Heat the vegetable broth in a saucepan and keep it warm over low heat.
In a separate large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and saut챕 until softened.
Add the sliced mushrooms to the saucepan and cook until they release their moisture.
Stir in the Arborio rice and cook for a minute, ensuring each grain is coated with butter.
Pour in the white wine and cook until it is absorbed by the rice.
Begin adding the warm vegetable broth to the rice, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly. Allow the broth to be absorbed before adding more.
Continue this process until the rice is cooked al dente and has a creamy consistency.
Stir in the grated Parmesan cheese, chopped parsley, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the mushroom risotto hot, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish with a rich meat sauce served over pasta.
preparation: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add onions, carrots, and celery. Cook until vegetables are softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in garlic, tomato paste, and dried herbs. Cook for 1 minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and beef broth. Bring to a simmer.
Cover and cook on low heat for 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve the sauce over cooked spaghetti and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Vegan Oatmeal Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and healthy vegan oatmeal pancakes made with plant-based ingredients.
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of rolled oats, 1 cup of almond milk, 1 ripe mashed banana, 2 tablespoons of maple syrup, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract.
Let the mixture sit for 10 minutes to allow the oats to soften.
