Assemble bowl by layering quinoa, spinach and mushrooms, sweet potato cubes, and scrambled eggs

recipes.title: Honey Mustard Chicken Salad
recipes.description: This salad is perfect for a light lunch or dinner. The honey mustard dressing adds a sweet and tangy flavor to the chicken and vegetables.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper and place them on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
In a small bowl, whisk together the honey, mustard, olive oil, and vinegar to make the dressing.
In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and avocado.
Slice the chicken and add it to the bowl.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Vegan Lentil and Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: A hearty and flavorful curry with lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices.
preparation: In a large pot, saut챕 onions, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add in chopped vegetables (such as carrots, bell peppers, and zucchini) and cook until tender.
Stir in lentils, vegetable broth, and spices (such as turmeric, cumin, and coriander).
Simmer until lentils are cooked through and flavors have melded together.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.

recipes.title: Spicy Chickpea and Spinach Curry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy vegetarian curry that's packed with flavor and nutrients.
preparation: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add chopped onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add curry powder, cumin, and chili powder and stir to combine.
Add chopped tomatoes, chickpeas, and vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.

recipes.title: Garlic and Herb Baked Chicken
recipes.description: This flavorful chicken dish is perfect for a healthy and satisfying dinner. The garlic and herb seasoning adds a delicious taste to the chicken, while keeping it juicy and tender.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Combine garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, pepper, and olive oil in a bowl.
Spread the mixture over the chicken breasts and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through.
Serve with your favorite vegetables or side dish.

recipes.title: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: These stuffed bell peppers are a healthy and delicious meal that is easy to make. The quinoa and vegetables make this dish filling and nutritious.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Cut the tops off of 4 bell peppers and remove the seeds and membranes.
In a large bowl, mix together cooked quinoa, diced tomatoes, black beans, corn, diced onion, minced garlic, and spices.
Spoon the mixture evenly into the bell peppers.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until the peppers are tender and the filling is hot.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed

recipes.title: Savory Breakfast Burrito
recipes.description: A delicious and filling breakfast burrito filled with scrambled eggs, black beans, avocado, and salsa.
preparation: Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook scrambled eggs until fully cooked.
Warm up black beans in a separate pan.
Heat up a tortilla in a pan or microwave.
Once the tortilla is warm, add scrambled eggs, black beans, sliced avocado, and salsa to the center.
Carefully wrap the burrito, tucking in the sides.
Serve and enjoy!

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Basil Pasta
recipes.description: A delicious and creamy pasta dish with a fresh tomato and basil flavor.
preparation: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, heat olive oil and add chopped garlic and diced tomatoes. Cook for 5-7 minutes until the tomatoes are soft.
Add heavy cream and chopped basil to the pan and stir until combined. Let simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Add the cooked pasta to the pan and toss until the pasta is coated in the sauce.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Enchiladas
recipes.description: A vegetarian twist on classic enchiladas, filled with sweet potato and black beans and topped with a spicy tomato sauce and melted cheese.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Peel and dice 2 medium sweet potatoes and saut챕 in a pan with 1 diced onion, 2 cloves minced garlic, and 1 can drained and rinsed black beans.
Add 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp chili powder, and salt and pepper to taste.
Spoon the sweet potato and black bean mixture onto 8 tortillas and roll up tightly.
Place the enchiladas in a baking dish and top with 1 can of diced tomatoes with green chilies and 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot with avocado and cilantro on top.
ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes with green chilies
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: sweet potato and black bean enchiladas

recipes.title: Vegan Lentil and Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A hearty and nutritious salad made with lentils, quinoa, and roasted vegetables.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).

In a large bowl, toss together the sweet potato, onion, and bell pepper with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread the vegetables in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until tender and lightly browned.
Meanwhile, cook the quinoa according to package instructions and set aside to cool.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked lentils, roasted vegetables, and cooked quinoa.
In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve the salad topped with chopped fresh parsley and a sprinkle of feta cheese, if desired.
ingredients: 1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced

recipes.title: Coconut Curry Shrimp
recipes.description: A delicious and flavorful shrimp curry that's perfect for dinner
preparation: In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add onion and cook until soft.
Add garlic and ginger and cook for another minute.
Add curry powder and cook for 30 seconds.
Add coconut milk, sugar, and fish sauce and bring to a simmer.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and cooked through.
Serve over rice and garnish with cilantro.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato and Mushroom Pasta
recipes.description: This delicious pasta dish is perfect for a cozy dinner at home. The creamy tomato sauce is mixed with tender mushrooms and served over your favorite pasta.
preparation: Cook your pasta according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for an additional minute.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, heavy cream, and Italian seasoning. Simmer for 10-15 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the sauce over the cooked pasta and enjoy!

recipes.title: Vegetarian Mushroom and Spinach Lasagna
recipes.description: A hearty and delicious vegetarian lasagna made with layers of mushroom, spinach, and creamy ricotta cheese.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large skillet, saut챕 the mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Add the spinach and cook until wilted.
In a separate bowl, mix the ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and egg.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Add a layer of lasagna noodles, followed by a layer of the mushroom and spinach mixture.
Spread a layer of the ricotta cheese mixture over the mushrooms and spinach.
Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used up, ending with a layer of tomato sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let cool for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Quinoa and Vegetable Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: This colorful bowl is packed with nutrients and flavor, perfect for a healthy and satisfying meal.
preparation: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast sweet potato and broccoli in the oven with olive oil, salt, and pepper
saut챕 bell peppers and onion in a pan with garlic and cumin
Assemble the bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, saut챕ed peppers and onions, avocado, and a drizzle of tahini dressing

recipes.title: Spicy Chickpea and Sweet Potato Curry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy curry dish with a spicy kick!
preparation: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add sweet potatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in chickpeas, curry powder, cumin, and cayenne pepper.
Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are tender.

recipes.title: Spicy Tuna Poke Bowl
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy poke bowl with fresh tuna, avocado, and spicy mayo.
preparation: Cook the rice according to package instructions
In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and ginger
Cut the tuna into bite-sized pieces and add to the bowl with the sauce, mix well
Slice the avocado and cucumber
Divide the rice between two bowls, top with the tuna mixture, avocado, cucumber, and edamame
Drizzle with spicy mayo and sprinkle with sesame seeds

recipes.title: Sesame Ginger Tofu Stir Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy vegan stir fry with crispy tofu, fresh vegetables, and a flavorful sesame ginger sauce.
preparation: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, honey, ginger, and garlic.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add tofu and stir fry until golden brown and crispy.
Remove tofu from pan and set aside.
Add vegetables (such as bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots) to the pan and stir fry until tender-crisp.
Add the tofu back to the pan and pour in the sauce.
Stir everything together until the sauce thickens and coats the tofu and vegetables.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Enchiladas
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy twist on traditional enchiladas.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the garlic, cumin, chili powder, and paprika and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the quinoa, black beans, corn, and salsa and stir to combine.
In a large baking dish, spread a thin layer of enchilada sauce on the bottom.
Fill each tortilla with the quinoa and black bean mixture and roll up tightly. Place the enchiladas seam-side down in the baking dish.
Pour the remaining enchilada sauce over the top of the enchiladas and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro and sliced avocado.
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
Chopped cilantro and sliced avocado, for garnish

recipes.title: Crispy Parmesan Chicken
recipes.description: A crispy and flavorful chicken dish coated in parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs.
preparation: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Mix parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, garlic powder, and paprika in a shallow dish.
Dip chicken breasts in beaten egg, then coat in breadcrumb mixture.
Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes or until cooked through.

recipes.title: Mushroom and Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
recipes.description: Tender chicken breast stuffed with a savory mixture of mushrooms and spinach, baked to perfection.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a skillet, saut챕 sliced mushrooms and chopped spinach in olive oil until tender.
Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper, then stuff with the mushroom and spinach mixture.
Place the stuffed chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot and enjoy!
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: mushroom and spinach stuffed chicken breast

recipes.title: Spicy Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy breakfast option that is packed with flavor.
preparation: Toast the bread
Mash the avocado and mix with lime juice, salt, and red pepper flakes
Spread the avocado mixture on the toast
Top with sliced tomato and a drizzle of olive oil

recipes.title: Quinoa and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy vegan stir fry recipe that's perfect for lunch or dinner.
preparation: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add vegetables to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes.
Add cooked quinoa to the skillet and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Savory Oatmeal with an Egg on Top
recipes.description: This is a simple and tasty recipe for savory oatmeal with a fried egg on top. It's a great way to switch up your usual breakfast routine and add some protein to your oatmeal.
preparation: In a small saucepan, bring the water to a boil. Add the oats, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes, or until the oats are cooked to your desired consistency.
Stir in the shredded cheese until it is melted.
In a separate pan, fry the egg over medium heat until the white is set and the yolk is cooked to your desired level of doneness.
Transfer the oatmeal to a bowl and top with the fried egg. Enjoy!
recipes.titleWithoutAccents: savory oatmeal with an egg on top

recipes.title: Spicy Shrimp Tacos
recipes.description: These spicy shrimp tacos are a quick and easy meal that packs a punch of flavor. The combination of juicy shrimp, tangy slaw, and creamy avocado makes for a satisfying and delicious taco.
ingredients: 1 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
preparation: In a small bowl, combine the chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper.
In a large bowl, toss the shrimp with the spice mixture until well coated.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until pink and cooked through.
Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or in the microwave.
To assemble the tacos, divide the cabbage and cilantro between the tortillas. Top with the cooked shrimp, avocado, and a dollop of sour cream. Serve with lime wedges on the side.

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: This classic Margherita pizza is simple but delicious, with just a few high-quality ingredients that let the flavors shine through.
preparation: Preheat your oven to 500째F (260째C).
Sprinkle some cornmeal on a baking sheet or pizza stone to prevent sticking.
Stretch your pizza dough to the desired shape and thickness and place it on the baking sheet or pizza stone.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the pizza dough, leaving a small border around the edge.
Place the fresh mozzarella slices on top of the tomato sauce, spacing them evenly.
Drizzle a little bit of olive oil over the pizza.
Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
Sprinkle some torn fresh basil leaves over the top of the pizza.
Slice and serve.
ingredients: 8 oz. (225 g) fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced
Small handful of fresh basil leaves, torn

recipes.title: Italian Herb Bruschetta
recipes.description: A classic Italian appetizer with fresh basil, tomatoes, and a hint of garlic. Perfectly toasted bread slices give it a crunch that balances the soft topping. A drizzle of balsamic glaze adds a tangy sweetness that brings all the flavors together.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Slice the baguette into 1/2 inch slices and arrange them on a baking sheet.
Brush each slice of bread with olive oil and bake for 10-15 minutes until crisp and slightly golden.
While the bread is toasting, combine chopped tomatoes, basil, and minced garlic in a bowl.
Season with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Mix well.
Once the bread is toasted, remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
Top each toasted bread slice with the tomato mixture.
Drizzle the bruschetta with balsamic glaze just before serving.

recipes.title: Creamy Pumpkin Soup
recipes.description: A warm and comforting creamy pumpkin soup that's full of flavor. It's smooth, light and a perfect start for your dinner. It's easy to make and a great way to use up the leftover pumpkin.
preparation: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onions and garlic and saut챕 until they become translucent.
Add the pumpkin, potato, and spices. Stir well to combine.
Pour in the vegetable broth and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 20 minutes or until the pumpkin and potato are tender.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. You can also transfer it to a regular blender and blend in batches if needed.
Stir in the cream and continue to cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve the soup hot with a sprinkle of pumpkin seeds on top.

recipes.title: Zucchini and Corn Grilled Pizza
recipes.description: This delightful pizza is made with fresh zucchini, sweet corn, and a blend of cheeses, all beautifully grilled to perfection.

Flip the pizza dough and quickly spread a thin layer of pizza sauce over the cooked side.
Top with mozzarella cheese, fresh zucchini slices, and sweet corn kernels.
Close the grill lid and cook for 3-4 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the bottom of the pizza is crispy.
Remove from grill and sprinkle with fresh basil leaves. Cut into slices and serve.

recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken
recipes.description: A simple and delicious chicken dish that's perfect for a weeknight meal. The chicken is seasoned with lemon and garlic and roasted to perfection.
preparation: Preheat oven to 220째C (425째F)
Rub chicken with olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper
Place chicken in a roasting pan and add lemon slices and garlic cloves around the chicken
Roast in the oven for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the skin is crispy
Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving

recipes.title: Grilled Asparagus and Feta Salad
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy salad that's perfect for a light lunch or a side dish. The combination of grilled asparagus, feta cheese, and a light lemon vinaigrette is truly refreshing.
preparation: Preheat the grill to medium heat.

Grill the asparagus for 3-4 minutes on each side, until tender and slightly charred.
In a large bowl, combine the grilled asparagus, feta cheese, and cherry tomatoes.
In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper to make the vinaigrette.
Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve the salad chilled or at room temperature.

1 cup of cherry tomatoes, halved (150 grams)

recipes.title: Lemon Herb Salmon

In a small bowl, combine lemon juice, chopped herbs, garlic, and a pinch of salt.
Pour the lemon herb sauce over the cooked salmon.
Serve the salmon with a side of steamed vegetables.

recipes.title: Italian Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: A vibrant, flavorful dish packed full of vegetables, perfect for a light dinner.
preparation: In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain well.

Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add garlic, bell peppers, carrot, peas and asparagus. Cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 3-4 minutes. Stir in crushed red pepper flakes if using.
Stir in pasta, Parmesan and heavy cream, if using; season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Serve immediately, garnished with Parmesan and parsley if desired.

recipes.title: Baked Lemon Herb Cod
recipes.description: A light and refreshing dish perfect for a quick weeknight dinner. The cod is baked to perfection with a delicious blend of lemon and herbs, delivering a burst of flavors in every bite.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
Rinse the cod fillets and pat dry.
Place the fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
In a small bowl, mix together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Pour the mixture over the cod fillets, making sure they are fully coated.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Serve immediately with lemon wedges on the side.

recipes.title: Garlic Herb Roasted Turkey
recipes.description: A delicious and succulent roasted turkey with a mix of fresh herbs and garlic. Perfect for a family feast.
preparation: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Rinse the turkey, and pat dry. Place in a roasting pan.
In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, crushed garlic, chopped rosemary, thyme, and parsley.
Rub the mixture all over the turkey, inside and out. Season with salt and pepper.
Roast in the preheated oven for 3 to 4 hours, or until the internal temperature of the turkey reaches 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
Let rest for 15 to 20 minutes before carving.

recipes.title: Strawberry Almond Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing, healthy salad with crisp lettuce, juicy strawberries, and crunchy almonds. Topped with a tangy homemade vinaigrette, this salad is perfect for a light lunch or dinner.
preparation: Wash and dry the lettuce and strawberries.
Chop the lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Slice the strawberries.
In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, honey, salt, and pepper to make the vinaigrette.
Combine the lettuce, strawberries, and almonds in a large bowl.
Drizzle the vinaigrette over the salad just before serving.
Toss the salad to evenly distribute the vinaigrette.

recipes.title: BBQ Pulled Chicken Sliders
recipes.description: Delicious and flavorful BBQ pulled chicken sliders that are perfect for a quick meal or party appetizer.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C) or gas mark 4.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded chicken, BBQ sauce, and seasonings. Mix well to coat the chicken evenly.
Place the mixture in a baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is heated through.
While the chicken is baking, prepare the slider buns. Slice them in half horizontally.
Once the chicken is ready, remove it from the oven and uncover.
Using a fork, shred the chicken further to achieve a pulled consistency.

recipes.title: Beef Rag첬
recipes.description: A delicious and hearty beef rag첬 made with tender beef, aromatic vegetables, and rich tomato sauce.

Add chopped onions, carrots, and celery to the pot. Cook until vegetables are softened, about 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic and cook for another minute.
Add ground beef to the pot and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.
Stir in tomato paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in crushed tomatoes, beef broth, red wine, and dried herbs. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook uncovered for at least 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Serve the beef rag첬 over cooked pasta or polenta, garnished with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Cooked pasta or polenta, for serving
Freshly grated Parmesan cheese, for garnish

recipes.title: Spicy Tomato Coconut Chicken
recipes.description: A delicious and flavorful chicken dish with a spicy kick and a creamy coconut sauce.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat.
Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add the onion, garlic, and ginger. Saut챕 until fragrant.
Add the cumin, coriander, turmeric, chili powder, and paprika. Stir well to combine.
Pour in the diced tomatoes and coconut milk. Bring to a simmer.
Return the chicken to the skillet and coat it with the sauce.
Cover the skillet and transfer it to the preheated oven.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

recipes.title: Crispy Rolled Chicken Pharma
recipes.description: A delicious and crispy chicken snack that is perfect for a keto diet.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 200째C (400째F).
In a bowl, mix together 1 cup almond flour, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
In another bowl, beat 2 eggs.
Dip each chicken breast into the beaten eggs, then coat them with the almond flour mixture.
Place the coated chicken breasts on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and crispy.

recipes.title: Creamy Cilantro Lime Chicken Tacos
recipes.description: These creamy cilantro lime chicken tacos are a delicious and easy-to-make dish that is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner. The creamy cilantro lime sauce adds a burst of flavor to the tender chicken, and the tacos can be customized with your favorite toppings.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, lime juice, garlic, cumin, salt, and pepper. Mix well and let marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Heat a large skillet over medium heat and add the marinated chicken. Cook for 6-8 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and no longer pink in the center.

While the chicken is cooking, prepare the creamy cilantro lime sauce. In a blender or food processor, combine the cilantro, lime juice, Greek yogurt, mayonnaise, garlic, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth and creamy.
Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or in the microwave.

To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of the creamy cilantro lime sauce onto each tortilla. Top with a few pieces of cooked chicken and your favorite toppings, such as diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, and sliced avocado.
Serve the creamy cilantro lime chicken tacos immediately and enjoy!
ingredients: Toppings of your choice: diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, sliced avocado

recipes.title: Basil Lemongrass Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful and healthy curry dish made with basil and lemongrass.
preparation: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and saut챕 until translucent.
Add minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped lemongrass. Cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add curry paste and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
Pour in coconut milk and vegetable broth. Stir well to combine.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for 10 minutes.
Add sliced bell peppers, carrots, and zucchini. Cook for another 5 minutes.
Stir in chopped basil leaves, lime juice, and soy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Veggie Garlic Noodles
recipes.description: Delicious and healthy noodles packed with vegetables and garlic flavor.
preparation: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and saut챕 until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add sliced bell peppers, carrots, and broccoli florets to the skillet. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Add the cooked noodles to the skillet and pour the sauce over them. Toss to coat evenly.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until the noodles are heated through.
Serve hot and garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds.

recipes.title: Chicken & Biscuit Bake
recipes.description: A delicious and hearty chicken and biscuit casserole that is perfect for dinner.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium heat.
Add 1 diced onion, 2 cloves of minced garlic, and 2 diced carrots to the skillet. Saut챕 for 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.

Add 2 cups of diced cooked chicken, 1 can of cream of chicken soup, 1 cup of chicken broth, 1 cup of frozen peas, 1 teaspoon of dried thyme, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of black pepper to the skillet. Stir well to combine.
Let the mixture simmer for 5 minutes until heated through.
Transfer the chicken mixture to a greased 9x13-inch baking dish.

In a medium bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon of baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, and 1/2 cup of cold butter. Use a pastry cutter or your fingers to cut the butter into the dry ingredients until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Pour in 1 cup of milk and stir until just combined.
Drop spoonfuls of the biscuit dough onto the chicken mixture in the baking dish.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until the biscuits are golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Taco Soup

Add diced onions and minced garlic, and cook until onions are translucent.
Add ground beef and cook until browned. Drain any excess fat.
Stir in taco seasoning, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, and beef broth.
Bring to a simmer and let cook for 10 minutes.
Add canned corn, black beans, and chopped bell peppers.
Simmer for an additional 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Oven-Baked French Bread Pizza
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make pizza using French bread as the crust.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
Slice the French bread in half lengthwise.
Spread pizza sauce evenly on each half of the bread.
Top with desired toppings such as cheese, pepperoni, vegetables, etc.
Place the prepared bread on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
Slice into desired portions and serve hot.
ingredients: Toppings of your choice (e.g. pepperoni, mushrooms, bell peppers, olives)

recipes.title: Bacon and Egg Ramen
recipes.description: A delicious and filling ramen dish with crispy bacon and a perfectly cooked egg.
preparation: Cook the ramen noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove from the skillet and set aside on paper towels to drain.
In the same skillet, add the garlic and ginger. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the chicken broth, soy sauce, and mirin. Bring to a simmer.
Add the cooked ramen noodles to the broth and stir to combine. Cook for 2-3 minutes until heated through.
In a separate non-stick pan, fry the eggs to your desired doneness.
Divide the ramen noodles and broth into bowls. Top with the crispy bacon and a fried egg.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Sheet Pan Sausage & Veggies
recipes.description: A delicious and easy one-pan dinner with sausage and roasted vegetables.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425째F (220째C).
Slice the sausages into bite-sized pieces.
Chop the vegetables into similar-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, toss the sausage and vegetables with olive oil, salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
Spread the mixture evenly on a sheet pan.
Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the sausage is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
Serve hot and enjoy!
ingredients: Optional seasonings: garlic powder, paprika, dried herbs

recipes.title: Pesto Chicken Bake
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make chicken dish with a flavorful pesto sauce.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish.
Spread pesto sauce over each chicken breast.
Top with shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the cheese is melted and golden brown.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Tuna & Avocado Wrap
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy wrap filled with tuna and avocado.
preparation: In a bowl, mix together canned tuna, diced avocado, chopped red onion, and chopped cilantro.
Season with salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
Spread the tuna and avocado mixture onto a tortilla wrap.
Add a handful of mixed greens and roll it up tightly.

recipes.title: BBQ Meatloaf & Veggie Dinner
recipes.description: A delicious and hearty meal with BBQ meatloaf and a side of roasted veggies.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 180째C (350째F).
In a large mixing bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, onion, garlic, egg, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Shape the mixture into a loaf shape and place it in a baking dish.
In a small bowl, whisk together ketchup, brown sugar, mustard, and vinegar. Pour the sauce over the meatloaf.
Bake the meatloaf in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, prepare the roasted veggies. Cut your choice of vegetables into bite-sized pieces and place them on a baking sheet.
Drizzle the vegetables with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.
Roast the vegetables in the oven at 200째C (400째F) for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and slightly caramelized.
Serve the BBQ meatloaf with the roasted veggies and enjoy!
ingredients: Assorted vegetables (e.g., carrots, bell peppers, zucchini)

recipes.title: Slow Cooked BBQ Chicken
recipes.description: Delicious and tender slow cooked BBQ chicken that is perfect for dinner.
preparation: In a slow cooker, combine chicken breasts, BBQ sauce, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Cook on low heat for 6-8 hours or on high heat for 3-4 hours, until chicken is tender and cooked through.
Remove chicken from slow cooker and shred using two forks.
Return shredded chicken to the slow cooker and mix with the remaining sauce.
Cook for an additional 30 minutes on low heat to allow the flavors to meld together.
Serve the slow cooked BBQ chicken on buns or with your favorite side dishes.
Enjoy!
ingredients: Buns or side dishes for serving

recipes.title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.description: Delicious and fluffy cinnamon rolls made from scratch.
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, combine warm milk, sugar, and yeast. Let it sit for 5 minutes until the mixture becomes frothy.
Add melted vegan butter, flour, and salt to the yeast mixture. Mix until a dough forms.
Knead the dough on a floured surface for 5-7 minutes until it becomes smooth and elastic.
Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1 hour or until it doubles in size.
Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Roll out the dough into a large rectangle on a floured surface.
Spread softened vegan butter over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
In a small bowl, mix together brown sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle this mixture evenly over the buttered dough.
Starting from the long side, tightly roll up the dough into a log.
Cut the log into 12 equal-sized rolls.
Place the rolls in a greased baking dish, leaving a little space between each roll.
Cover the baking dish with a clean cloth and let the rolls rise for another 30 minutes.
Bake the cinnamon rolls in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown.
While the rolls are baking, prepare the icing by mixing powdered sugar, vegan cream cheese, vanilla extract, and a little plant-based milk until smooth.
Once the cinnamon rolls are done baking, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
Drizzle the icing over the warm rolls and serve.
Enjoy your homemade vegan cinnamon rolls!

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Breakfast Cups
recipes.description: Delicious and nutritious breakfast cups made with sweet potatoes.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 375째F (190째C).
Peel and grate the sweet potatoes.
In a bowl, mix the grated sweet potatoes with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grease a muffin tin and press the sweet potato mixture into each cup, forming a crust.
Bake the sweet potato crusts for 15 minutes until slightly golden.
Meanwhile, in a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, spinach, bell pepper, and cheese.
Remove the sweet potato crusts from the oven and pour the egg mixture into each cup.
Bake for an additional 20 minutes or until the eggs are set.
Allow the breakfast cups to cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and grated

recipes.title: Crispy Chipotle Rice Balls
recipes.description: These crispy chipotle rice balls are a delicious and flavorful vegetarian dinner option. The spicy chipotle adds a smoky kick to the dish, while the crispy exterior gives a satisfying crunch. Serve them with a side of salsa or guacamole for a complete meal.
preparation: Cook the rice according to package instructions and let it cool.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, chipotle sauce, grated cheese, chopped cilantro, minced garlic, and salt. Mix well to combine.
Take a small handful of the rice mixture and shape it into a ball. Repeat with the remaining mixture.
In a shallow dish, whisk the eggs. In another shallow dish, combine the breadcrumbs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Dip each rice ball into the beaten eggs, then roll it in the breadcrumb mixture, pressing gently to adhere.
Heat oil in a deep skillet or pot over medium heat. Fry the rice balls in batches until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Remove the rice balls from the skillet and drain on a paper towel-lined plate.
Serve the crispy chipotle rice balls hot with salsa or guacamole on the side.
ingredients: 1 cup grated cheese (such as cheddar or mozzarella)

recipes.title: Turkey Roulade
recipes.description: A delicious and flavorful turkey dish that is perfect for any occasion.
preparation: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
Place the turkey breast on a cutting board and season with salt and pepper.
In a bowl, combine the breadcrumbs, garlic, thyme, and parsley.
Spread the breadcrumb mixture evenly over the turkey breast.
Roll up the turkey breast tightly and secure with kitchen twine.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the turkey roulade and cook until browned on all sides.
Transfer the turkey roulade to a baking dish and roast in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until the internal temperature reaches 165째F (74째C).
Remove the turkey roulade from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
Serve hot and enjoy!
